rooms.description: A welcoming area with natural light and a blend of Bohemian decor.
An open-plan space featuring comfortable seating, eclectic art, and vibrant fabrics.
A dedicated workspace with natural lighting to boost productivity; features a minimalistic yet inspiring design.
A compact, functional kitchen designed with local materials and Bohemian flair.
A cozy bedroom with a balcony offering fresh air and scenic views; decorated with vibrant textiles and artisanal decor.
A secondary bedroom featuring a balcony for relaxation and a touch of Bohemian style with eclectic patterns.
Compact yet functional bathroom designed to complement the overall aesthetic with efficient plumbing.

openings.notes: Placed following Vastu principles to enhance positive energy flow.
Each bedroom has a dedicated balcony opening providing access to the external view.
Ensures ample natural light and ventilation for productivity while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

vastu_considerations.furniture_placement: Minimalistic with open spaces to allow free movement of positive energy.
vastu_considerations.color_palette: Earthy tones complemented by vibrant Bohemian accents.

building_norms.corner_plot_utilization: Design optimized for maximum natural light and ventilation across all rooms.
